passives.name: Savagery
passives.description: Your critical strikes apply Deep Wounds to the target. Deep Wounds deal 5.0% (Weapon Power) weapon damage to the target every 3 seconds for 12 seconds and heal you by 15% of the damage dealt per stack. You can have up to 3 Deep Wounds stacks on a target. Every subsequent stack will refresh the duration.

passives.name: Bloodlust
passives.description: Whenever you get below 30% health, Bloodlust (Spell) will increase your 10.0% (Weapon Power), critical chance by 20% and attack speed by 20% for 10 seconds. This effect can occur once every 90 seconds. Every time you cast Brutal Strike (Spell) it will reduce the remaining cooldown of Bloodlust (Spell) by 1.5 seconds.

passives.name: Hatred
passives.description: Whenever you deal damage, gain 1 stack of Hatred. Whenever you take damage, gain 2 stacks of Hatred for 6 seconds. Each stack of Hatred increases your (Attack Power) by 1% and reduces your (Defense Power) by 1%. This effect can occur once every 2 seconds, stacking up to 10 times.

passives.name: Bloodseeker
passives.description: Heals 15% of the damage dealt by basic attacks.

passives.name: Concentrated Impact
passives.description: Whenever you cast a skill and deals a critical strike with it, apply a Sunder to the target for 12 seconds. Each stack of Sunder reduces the target's (Defense Power) by 3.0% of your (Weapon Power), stacking up to 5 times.

passives.name: Bloodbath
passives.description: Whenever you deal damage with your basic attacks, gain one stack of Bloodbath, melee basic attacks will give double of the amount. Each stack of Bloodbath heals 0.1% of the damage dealt, stacking up to 20 times. Upon reaching the maximum amount of stacks gain Frenzy, removing all stacks of Bloodbath and healing 10% of Maximum Health. Frenzy heals 10% of the damage dealt for 10 seconds. Bloodbath (Spell) effect goes on a 40 second cooldown upon gaining Frenzy.

spells.name: Berserk
spells.description: Generates 100 Aether after a 1.5 second delay and additional 50 Aether every 5 seconds in Berserk, but lowers your (Defense Power) by 10% for 5 seconds.

ravencards.name: dire bear
ravencards.description: Berserk (Spell) duration is doubled, and your (Attack Power) is increased by 12.0% for 8 seconds. You can't receive any healing for Berserk (Spell) duration.

ravencards.name: goblin berserker
ravencards.description: Berserk (Spell) duration is doubled, you now gain no Aether, but your critical damage and haste are increased by 20.0% for 10 seconds.

spells.name: Shieldbreak
spells.description: Deals 100.0% (Weapon Power) weapon damage and reduces target's (Weapon Defense) by 5.0% (Weapon Power) for 8 seconds. Adds 3.0% (Weapon Power) of (Weapon Defense) reduction per 10 Aether consumed. The range of this ability adapts to the weapon you are currently wielding.

ravencards.name: kaiman ambusher
ravencards.description: Shieldbreak (Spell) has no cooldown, health cost is reduced by 80% and generates 20 Aether instead, but its damage is reduced by 72.0% (Weapon Power) weapon damage. Shieldbreak (Spell) can stack up to 3 times and the duration of (Weapon Defense) reduction increased to 8 seconds.

ravencards.name: skeleton rotclub
ravencards.description: Basic attacks against a target affected by Shieldbreak (Spell) receive additional 18.0% (Weapon Power) weapon damage.

spells.name: Guillotine
spells.description: Deals 50.0% (Weapon Power) weapon damage to the target. Increases damage by 35.0% (Weapon Power) per 10 Aether consumed.

ravencards.name: saltdusk executioner
ravencards.description: Increases Guillotine (Spell) damage by 60.0% (Weapon Power) weapon damage if the target is 35% or below health.

ravencards.name: dwarf legionnaire
ravencards.description: Guillotine (Spell) applies Mortal Wounds to the target. Reducing all healing received by 30.0% for 6 seconds.

spells.name: Earthquake
spells.description: Deals 100.0% (Weapon Power) weapon damage in a medium area, slowing targets by 30% for 6 seconds. Increases damage by 20.0% (Weapon Power) per 10 Aether consumed.

ravencards.name: dwarf elementalist
ravencards.description: Earthquake (Spell) will occur a second time on the same tiles for 35.0% of the damage. The second Earthquake (Spell) does not slow.

ravencards.name: twinhead yeti
ravencards.description: On hit, Earthquake (Spell) reduces the (Defense Power) of creatures affected by 12.0% of your (Weapon Power) and (Spell Power) spell damage for 8 seconds.

ravencards.name: troll knight
ravencards.description: Bladestorm (Spell) now applies a bleed effect that deals 12.0% (Weapon Power) weapon damage every 2 seconds to every creature affected for a total of 10 seconds.

ravencards.name: dwarf warrior
ravencards.description: Whenever you are channeling Bladestorm (Spell), you will be slowed by 38.0%.

ravencards.name: hog warlord
ravencards.description: Feasting Strike (Spell) doesn't deal damage, but its healing effectiveness is increased by 7.0% per 25 Aether consumed.

ravencards.name: polar bear
ravencards.description: Feasting Strike (Spell) doesn't consume Aether or heal you, but gives you 44.0% Weapon Leech for 10 seconds.

spells.name: Bull Rush
spells.description: Charges 5 tiles forward, any targets within 3 tiles width in front receive 50.0% (Weapon Power) weapon damage. Passed targets are pushed back.

ravencards.name: toad enforcer
ravencards.description: Bullrush (Spell) stuns your target for 1.2 seconds.

ravencards.name: boar runt
ravencards.description: Bullrush now decreases the (Defense Power) of your target by 6.5% (Weapon Power) for 8 seconds.

spells.name: Fierce Leap
spells.description: Jumps to a location slamming the ground in a medium area, dealing 100.0% (Weapon Power) weapon damage. Stuns enemies in a small area and slows by 50% in a medium area for 2 seconds.

ravencards.name: shark harpooner
ravencards.description: Fierce Leap (Spell) no longer stuns the inside ring, but grants you a (Weapon Power) weapon damage buff of 12.0% and Movement Speed buff of 12.0% for 8 seconds.

ravencards.name: minotaur duelist
ravencards.description: Fierce Leap (Spell) now creates a circle of blood runes in small area when you land for 3.6 seconds. The blood runes can be removed if you cast the ability again for its duration.

spells.name: Fissure
spells.description: Deals 100.0% (Weapon Power) weapon damage and stuns targets in a cone-shaped area in front for 1.5 seconds. Increases stun by 0.2 seconds per 10 Aether consumed.

ravencards.name: dwarf prospector
ravencards.description: Fissure (Spell) will apply 14.0% slow to targets affected for 8 seconds.

ravencards.name: troll titan
ravencards.description: Reduces the remaining cooldown of Earthquake (Spell) by 30.0% if you hit 3 or more targets.

spells.name: Pummel
spells.description: Interrupts the target's channeling, dealing 40.0% (Weapon Power) weapon damage. An interrupted skill can't be used again within 5 seconds.

ravencards.name: rargum the dread
ravencards.description: Increases your (Attack Power) by 12.0% for 6 seconds, if you successfully interrupt an ability.

ravencards.name: troll brawler
ravencards.description: If you successfully interrupt an ability, stuns the target for 2.5 seconds.

spells.name: Brutal Strike
spells.description: Deals 100.0% (Weapon Power) weapon damage to the target. Every third Brutal Strike (Spell) heals you for 30.0% (Weapon Power) health.

ravencards.name: rat spiketail
ravencards.description: Upon using Brutal Strike (Spell) gain Taste for Blood. Taste for Blood increases the damage of your next Guillotine (Spell) by 6.0% per stack, up to 3 stacks. Taste for Blood lasts for 6 seconds.

ravencards.name: troll
ravencards.description: Increases the healing of Brutal Strike (Spell) by 13.0%. If your health is below 50%, increases healing of Brutal Strike (Spell) by 30.0%.

spells.name: Spiked Chains
spells.description: Throws chains in a cone-shaped area in front of you. Every target hit by it will be snared for 1 second, slowed by 30% for 3 seconds and pulled to your direction if there is enough room.

ravencards.name: chainwraith prowler
ravencards.description: Increases the slow duration by 3.0 seconds.

ravencards.name: ghaz sandrider
ravencards.description: Spiked Chains (Spell) reduces the (Weapon Defense) of creatures hit by 6.5% for 8 seconds.
